reviews.review_msg: Halil is the most helpful professor. I usually don't write about professors, but when I read the feedback on him, I just had to. Yes he might not be clear with assignments and projects. However, he is very approachable and would gladly help if you ask. He calls his students friends, not students. Amazing prof I'd take more courses with him anytime.

A serious note: if you like being patronized and treated like a high school student, then this is the guy for you. As pointed out, he's quite rude, gives awful lectures (badly put together PPT(!) slides and monotonous speech), give nasty feedback and justify them as being "constructive", can't communicate properly (English not his first language).
